# Doom (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[Corruption (Domain)|Corruption 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 274

This spell fills a single subject with a feeling of horrible dread that causes it to become [[Shaken|shaken]].

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Corruption 1 to Level per *Fiendish Codex I.*
